title: Court rules in favor of Google after Genius claimed ‘stolen’ lyrics… again [Updated]
content:
In 2019, lyric-website Genius accused Google of ripping off its lyric transcriptions to use in Search even catching Google “red-handed” in the act. Following a court case win in 2020, Google has once again prevailed in court over this matter.

more…

The post Court rules in favor of Google after Genius claimed ‘stolen’ lyrics… again [Updated] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Genius, a site which serves song lyrics, is serving Google and LyricFind with a lawsuit over allegedly stealing lyrics from the site.
